/*kr.kosmo.jobkorea.statistics.dao.FailedNumDao.countListFailedNum*/ SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT l.no , l.title , DATE_FORMAT(l.startdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as startdate , DATE_FORMAT(l.enddate, '%Y-%m-%d') as enddate , ifnull(table01.targetNum,0) as targetNum , ifnull(table03.failedNum,0) as failedNum FROM tb_lecture as l LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_tcourse as t ON l.no = t.no LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT no, count(*) as targetNum FROM tb_tcourse GROUP BY no ) as table01 ON l.no = table01.no LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT no, count(*) as failedNum FROM ( SELECT no, re, loginID, sum(score) as totalScore FROM tb_testanswer GROUP BY no, re, loginID HAVING re = 'main' AND sum(score) < 60 ) as table02 GROUP BY no ) as table03 ON t.no = table03.no WHERE 1=1
AND l.startdate >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND l.enddate <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY l.no ) as table04
